name: @google-cloud/gapic-generator
description: Google API Client Library Generator for TypeScript, written in TypeScript.
author: Google LLC

scripts.compile-protos-json: pbjs -t json -o protos/protos.json -p node_modules/google-gax/build/protos -p protos google/api/annotations.proto google/api/field_behavior.proto google/api/field_info.proto google/api/resource.proto google/api/routing.proto google/longrunning/operations.proto google/protobuf/compiler/plugin.proto service_config.proto snippet_index.proto
scripts.compile-protos-js: pbjs -t static-module -o protos/index.js -p node_modules/google-gax/build/protos -p protos google/api/annotations.proto google/api/field_behavior.proto google/api/field_info.proto google/api/resource.proto google/api/routing.proto google/longrunning/operations.proto google/protobuf/compiler/plugin.proto service_config.proto snippet_index.proto
scripts.prepack:cjs: npm run compile && cd templates/cjs/typescript_gapic && rm -f package.json.njk && mv package.json package.json.njk && cd ../../.. && mkdir -p build && cp -rf bazel-bin/typescript templates protos build/
scripts.prepack:esm: npm run compile && cd templates/esm/typescript_gapic && rm -f package.json.njk && mv package.json package.json.njk && cd ../../.. && mkdir -p build && cp -rf bazel-bin/typescript templates protos build/
scripts.prepack: npm run prepack:cjs && npm run prepack:esm
scripts.postpack:cjs: cd templates/cjs/typescript_gapic && mv package.json.njk package.json && ln -s package.json package.json.njk
scripts.postpack:esm: cd templates/esm/typescript_gapic && mv package.json.njk package.json && ln -s package.json package.json.njk
scripts.postpack: npm run postpack:cjs && npm run postpack:esm
